thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: Hon-Peng Phillip Lau
thread.title_full: ToursByLocals reviewed by Hon-Peng Phillip Lau

author: Hon-Peng Phillip Lau
title: Hon-Peng Phillip Lau
text:
We have used ToursByLocals many times and they were always dependable and well conducted. The last two tours in New Zealand by Doug Farr were particularly worth noting. Doug was very experienced in conducting educational group tour, so his tour are both interesting and educational. He also helped to tailor the tour to fit our need and made it very flexible, making everyone in the group of 16 enjoyed the tour very much.
In addition, you can arranged be to picked up at any point at the location, and the price is right, much cheaper for a group than joining excursions offered by cruise ship.
